title: Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services        There are limited services inside Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument.  A small selection of snacks are sold in the bookstore at the Kris Eggle Visitor Center. The surrounding communities provide lots of choices for food, lodging and gas.  Lukeville, AZ (5 miles south of Visitor Center)   Convenience Store Gas Station Post Office RV Park  Why, AZ (22 miles north of Visitor Center)     Gas Station Convenience Store Restaurant RV Parks  Ajo, AZ (34 miles north of Visitor Center)     Gas Stations Restaurants Grocery Store RV Parks Mechanic Hotels/Motels visit Ajo Chamber of Commerce for more information       Â     Historic Plaza in Ajo, AZ
